modName: I Hate Chickens - Also On Steam-Workshop
summary:
**IF THE DOWNLOAD DOES\'NT WORK, USE THE MEDIAFIRE-MIRROR!**


We all killed the chicken, when we entered Riverwood for the first time... But now... Claim your revenge.... FOR SKYRIM!!!!1!!1!!!!1


(**You can kill the chicken without recieving a bounty! :3**)

*2.0.0 - Added more chickens to kill! :D ( Not every single one in skyrim, tho...
